--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Megatron frowned, and his face turned into a hideous mask of rage as 
he
> screamed. "NO, somehow the thrusters were dammaged in the landing. 
The
> ship will never take off." he pointed his cannon at the nearest 
thing,
> Switchblade, and was about to incinerate the Decepticon hacker. Just
> then though, he had an idea. He turned around, and activated the 
main
> laser cannon on the front of the ship. He looked throught the camera
> with a smile, as they hummed to life.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Sea Gulls flew calmly over the ocean, but in seconds they scattered 
from
> a nois, like hundreds of thunder bolts. A ray of intense heat 
emerged
> from the Hudson bay, as the Dark Avian blasted it's finest weapon. 
Due
> to not being ancored, the recoil caused the dark ship to fall back 
on
> the cliff, and it began to teeter, then the weight of the ship, 
helped
> with gravity began to plummet into the Hudson Bay. It landed with a 
huge
> splash, sending a tital wave up, and towards the group of fighting
> Decepticons who were on the beach.
> 
> Megatron stabalized himself. He turned to his troops. "I have 
buisness
> to attend to, Switchblade, steer the ship to the location I talked 
to
> you about earlier." with that, Megatron soared out of the floating 
ship,
> and towards the Obylisk.


::BLINDCHAOS AND DOMNIJOE::

    Domnijoe's face twisted into a mask of alarm when the ship 
lurched. As soon as the ship settled, she smiled slyly. 
    "I'm off, Lord Megatron." she said before her leader flew off. She 
waited a momment before she, too, left the ship the same way her 
leader departed.
    Blindchaos was thrilled to have a job and followed Megatron like 
an eager puppy. He said nothing. He simply followed and kept his eyes 
peeled for any confrontations that would disturb his new commander.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
*****************
